p: Three gram of sunflower oil was mixed separately with different concentrations of the lemon verbena essential oil (Zero, 200, 400, 800, 1,600, and 3,200 ppm) and BHT as control antioxidant and then exposed to Rancimat (Metrohm model 734, Herisan, Switzerland) at 120°C at an airflow of 15 L/hr. During heating process of sunflower oil containing different concentrations of lemon verbena essential oil and BHT at specific time interval, also OSI was determined at 120°C. Measuring vessels, electrodes, connecting tubes, and glassware were cleaned several times before the experiments.
